meanings.definition: Christies: a plural noun referring to a type of auction house known for selling fine art and other valuable items.
meanings.sent1: At Christies, people bid on beautiful paintings and rare artifacts.
meanings.sent2: I visited Christies to see the stunning collection of art pieces.
meanings.sent3: The auction at Christies was like a treasure hunt for art lovers.
meanings.sent4: In the world of auctions, Christies shines like a sparkling gem.
meanings.sent5: The atmosphere at Christies is filled with elegance and sophistication.
